description: Approval of details of condition 31(2a - code for sustainable homes ) in respect of application to vary the wording of conditions 5 (noise control), 35 (Temporary and permanent gates and fencing) ,42 (disabled lift)  and 68 (drawings and documents list) of planning permission reference P092187 dated 13 April 2010 [Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to vary the wording of conditions 4; 5; 9; 20; 21; 22; 25; 26; 28; 29; 30; 31; 33; 34; 35; 37; 39; 40; 41; 46; 56 & 65 of planning permission P082018 dated 30 July 2009 for the: demolition of existing buildings and redevelopment of the site, move the position of Queensland Road (which involves stopping up the existing road) and develop one new building to the north and one to the south.  The building to the south would be up to six storeys high (with photovoltaic) and provide 213 residential units and 345 sq.m of commercial space, with a mix of class A1 (shops), A2(financial and professional services), A3 (restaurants and cafes), A4 (drinking establishments), B1 (business).  The building to the north would incorporate five towers providing 10 to 15 floors of residential accommodation above a plinth of mainly commercial space.  It would provide 516 residential units, 1,600 sq.m of sports centre for Arsenal Football Club and 1,330 sq.m of commercial space with a mix of class A1/A2/A3/A4/B1 as described above and 179 car parking spaces.]
decision_conditions: Separate approval of details for condition 31 parts ‘1b’ and ‘2b’ is still required, it being noted that details for the north west building in respect of pt 1a were previously approved 22 Jun 2012 [Ref: P092187(c31c52)]
